title: Deploy
text: Well! Leave it up to me!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Great job! I was right about you. You're totally nailing it, even compared to that maddening Safiyyah!

title: Standard Victory
text: It's finally over. Let's go back and have some drinks to celebrate!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Victory was achieved thanks to our teamwork. Let's have a fancy meal tonight to celebrate!

title: Standard Victory
text: We won. Thank you guys! Have a good rest tonight!

title: Deploy
text: It's time to make them suffer.

title: Continuous Finisher
text: This is the price you have to pay!

title: Perfect Victory
text: That was impressive... Huh? It's obviously cause I was here!

title: Standard Victory
text: Well... Just fight to win. Don't overthink it.

title: Deploy
text: Anything interesting? I want to play!

title: Battle Standby 1
text: I am one of the Statues.

title: Healthy
text: Eh... Which one should I use?

title: Critical
text: Boohoo... I don't want to die...

title: Perfect Victory
text: Eh? It's over? But there's more stuff I wanted to try!

title: Standard Victory
text: That wasn't good enough! I wanna do it again!

title: Deploy
text: Show me what you can do.

title: Buff Ally
text: You know how to repay me.

title: Healthy
text: There is no room for recklessness.

title: Exhausted
text: This is the price that must be paid.

title: Perfect Victory
text: Perfect tactics and impeccable command. Well done. You have proved your talent.

title: Standard Victory
text: There is no victory without consequence. It is our responsibility to make those decisions.

title: Deploy
text: Join hands with me to win!

title: Standard Finisher
text: We have made one more step forward.

title: Self Buff
text: I will show you... what I am capable of!

title: Injured
text: Don't worry. Everything is under control.

title: Critical
text: Damn it! We need to adjust our plan.

title: Exhausted
text: No way... Where did I go wrong...?

title: Perfect Victory
text: Elegance, perfect, and impeccable. We've got everything covered!

title: Standard Victory
text: A careful plan will certainly lead us to victory!

title: Buff Ally
text: Adjust yourself and follow my instructions!

title: Critical
text: What's the matter? Not done yet!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Good command . Would you like to exchange tactics over drinks?

title: Standard Victory
text: Good job . Your tactics should be improved, but you are still much better than Rawiyah.

title: Deploy
text: If you want me to work myself to the bone, you must pay!

title: Continuous Finisher
text: I'm gonna charge you extra for that.

title: Healthy
text: Tell me, which one do you want me to kill?

title: Critical
text: Well, you need to pay me more for that.

title: Perfect Victory
text: You can have all the victories you want, as long as you can pay the price.

title: Standard Victory
text: If it happens again, I'm raising my rates!

title: Deploy
text: Praises of delicateness can also be a powerful weapon.

title: Exhausted
text: My mission... is not completed yet…

title: Perfect Victory
text: A perfect victory. You have kept your words. Can I... trust you again?

title: Standard Victory
text: It's a tough battle. Please allow me to present a song of praise for our victory...

title: Exhausted
text: Don't stop because of one failure…

title: Perfect Victory
text: Quite the perfect victory… Perfect enough to boost everyone's morale. Thank you.

title: Standard Victory
text: We must bring our experience together to come up with the best tactics and keep making progress. Come on!

title: Deploy
text: I will protect my homeland, with arrows and strings!

title: Standard Finisher
text: You won't get away with this!!

title: Continuous Finisher
text: Wind, please give me more strength.

title: Damage 1
text: I won't let you get away!

title: Exhausted
text: Sorry, I failed to keep my word...

title: Perfect Victory
text: Incredible! You've protected everyone. Maybe you are the one who can bring us hope...

title: Standard Victory
text: Thanks, everyone. May the wind of the Vltar Mountain bring us peace.

title: Standard Finisher
text: I will no longer run away.

title: Continuous Finisher
text: Sorry. I have to do this.

title: Damage 1
text: Please get out of my way!

title: Buff Ally
text: Keep holding on. I am right behind you.

title: Healthy
text: Anything I can do to help?

title: Critical
text: I must face this head on…

title: Exhausted
text: Sorry... I've let all of you down...

title: Perfect Victory
text: Thank you, if it were not for you, who knows how things might have ended?

title: Standard Victory
text: For the people of Iria, I must shoulder my responsibilities, so that there will be no more sacrifices and suffering...

title: Perfect Victory
text: ... Yet another step forward. Thank you for your guidance. May the Light protect you forever.

title: Standard Victory
text: Light of Sanctuary, when will the senseless bloodshed and sacrifices end...

title: Deploy
text: This place… is full of malevolence.

title: Injured
text: Do you want me to eliminate them?

title: Exhausted
text: Is this... the feeling of pain?

title: Perfect Victory
text: Have I… done a good job? Ah, really? I always feel assured when you are around…

title: Standard Victory
text: Mission accomplished… Just leave me alone for a while…

title: Summon
text: When I was locked in chains, I believed it was my fate. They all said… that I was a good subject for experiments and also a perfect weapon on the battlefield… Isn't that a compliment? Why would I feel regret?

title: Level Up
text: Gaining power makes me ache, but I like that it feels real.

title: Star Level Up
text: Does this mean that… I am special to you?

title: Serve as Assistant
text: I feel strange when I am around you. Are you sure you want me to do this?

title: Mail Reminder
text: You receive a piece of paper with a strange seal. Shall I destroy it?

title: Event Reminder
text: It seems that there are new tasks waiting for you. Well, I will face them with you… if you need me.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Special care from you? I'm looking forward to it…

title: Idle
text: I won't feel bored as long as I'm with you.

title: Buff Ally
text: Let us fight side by side!

title: Critical
text: The banner of justice will never fall!

title: Perfect Victory
text: A perfect victory. Glad to fight together with you, my leader.

title: Standard Victory
text: Perhaps this is the price to uphold justice. Thank you, this victory was brought by you.

title: Summon
text: With fairness as my ruler and justice as my weapon, I will eliminate darkness and injustice! This is my oath as a Paladin. I, Gloria Pascale Roland, will fight alongside you!

title: Level Up
text: Thank you, my leader. I won't let you down.

title: Learn Skills
text: I shall use this power more carefully.

title: Star Level Up
text: Thank you. I hope to walk by your side forever, my leader.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Understood. I'll take care of the routine tasks.

title: Mail Reminder
text: You have received new correspondence. Please take care of it as soon as possible.

title: Event Reminder
text: You have a scheduled arrangement. Would you like me to accompany you?

title: Idle
text: Such leisurely time is nice, too.

title: Chat
text: Hmm… You found me? I just want to be alone in a quiet place for a while…

title: Chat 2
text: You want to know what I think of you? Well, I am curious about you. Because talking to you makes me somehow happy...

title: Chat 3
text: How... have you been? Hmm... Someone told me to greet someone special in this way. Is it weird?

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: It's amazing. I feel better suddenly. Thank you.

title: Chat 2
text: I was confused about the ideal and reality. It is your firm support that gave me the courage to move forward. Thank you.

title: Chat 3
text: I think I have found my mission, that is, to protect the happiness of the world forever, whether in Iria or in Elysium... Thank you, my leader.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: I thank you. This bond will be my everlasting treasure.

title: Alert
text: Do you want to give it a try?

title: Summon
text: Hey, were you waiting for me? Us meeting again must be destiny. Changing the world and resisting fate isn't easy, but don't worry. I've got your back.

title: Level Up
text: Haha, well done! Keep it up!

title: Star Level Up
text: With great power comes great responsibility. I accept your expectations.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Leave it to me. You go ahead and do what you need to do!

title: Mail Reminder
text: Hmm? Do you want me to open the mail for you?

title: Event Reminder
text: I've got nothing to do. How about we check out the event together?

title: Chat
text: My right hand? Happened years ago. The artificial limb works well, it's no trouble. And not too visible, right? It's actually my secret weapon. When the time's right... bang! Comes in handy.

title: Chat 2
text: The little ones are very happy recently. They have regarded this place as their home, and they completely regard you as their family ... Even if I am gone one day, it seems that there will be nothing to worry about.

title: Chat 3
text: I think I understand now. To see the truth of something clearly, eyes alone aren't enough - you need to use your heart too. Let go of stray thoughts, shed the burdens in your heart, and look ahead... There's still a long road ahead, so why should we be in a rush for answers at this moment?

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: C'mon! Between us, there's no need to be shy!

title: Idle
text: Since we're both just hanging around, wanna get a drink?

title: Summon
text: Feeling a bit lost? No sweat! Take a moment, pat yourself on the back, and remember this – with a heart brimming with courage, you can leap over any hurdle life throws at you! I'm Masha, and I can't wait to see what we'll tackle together. Here's to our future adventures!

title: Level Up
text: Hehe, working harder and harder pays off, huh?

title: Learn Skills
text: Wow, this will definitely help everyone!

title: Star Level Up
text: Thank you, Boss! I will better protect everyone in the future!

title: Serve as Assistant
text: No problem! Just leave it to me!

title: Mail Reminder
text: Boss, there's a letter in the mailbox outside. Remember to read it!

title: Event Reminder
text: Are you ready to go? Faycal really wanted to join in, so be sure to take him with you!

title: Chat
text: The key to optimism? Hmm... When you are unhappy, eat something delicious! I love cupcakes, drumsticks... Oh! And canned octopus! Would you like one? They taste great!

title: Chat 2
text: For Maitha, as long as there is family, it is home. Thank you for saving Boss and Faycal. Let's guard this Elysium together and strive to turn it into a warm home!

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Sorry, it's a long hard day for you again.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: The bond between heart and mind... is this the tie that binds?

title: Idle
text: A good leader should get lots of rest! Adequate sleep is the secret to vitality, after all.

title: Summon
text: Hmph. Since you were recognized by both Rawiyah and Maitha, I guess I'll help you... As long as you prove to be trustworthy.

title: Level Up
text: I'll become stronger so those two will be able to rely on me…

title: Learn Skills
text: Hmph! With this, I'll show the enemy what for!

title: Star Level Up
text: ... In the future, if there is anything I can do to help, just say the word, and— Ah, forget it…

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Come on... I don't want to do this kind of work.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Hey, there's a letter for you. Don't forget about it.

title: Event Reminder
text: Do you need my help with the next challenge? ... Don't get me wrong... I'm not here because I want to be. Maitha asked me to.…

title: Chat
text: Boss seems to really trust you. I don't know if it's because of your face or what extraordinary skills you have... Don't take it the wrong way. This is not a compliment. In any case... I will keep an eye on you.

title: Chat 2
text: You are really a trustworthy partner… D-don't be complacent! … There are still many challenges to face in the future, so you have to be careful … Don't let everyone worry…

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Does it have to be like this? Okay...

title: Idle
text: Can I do anything? If Maitha finds out you did everything by yourself, she'll yell at me...

title: Summon
text: Whoa! What's this place? Ooh, amazing! So amazing! Ooh, a talking cat! Yup. I'm staying. Huh? Who are you? … You look kind of familiar… I am the great Sorceress, Beryl! Hehe. Scary, right?

title: Level Up
text: Hehe, you're a real treat! Here, have a candy!

title: Star Level Up
text: Hahaha! That was so much fun, do it again! Again!

title: Mail Reminder
text: Have you ever wondered how the letters in the mailbox get delivered? Hmm... I really wanna know!

title: Event Reminder
text: Is something interesting happening? Let's go together! And then, let's bring a big Calamity back! A really big one!

title: Chat
text: Hmm... Hmm... Are Calamity biological or mechanical? How do their structures move? Are they able to form thoughts, and what's their energy source? Hmm... I really wanna know!

title: Chat 2
text: Let's equip the new device and head to that mysterious area we just discovered. Catching a dozen calamities at once will be a breeze! But... I always hear strange sounds whenever we go there... Maybe the calamity there is even stronger than the ones in the Sea of Chaos? Hmm... Perhaps they can communicate with each other like humans? Ah! If only we could catch one that can talk and ask it some questions!

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Is that fun? I wanna try it too!

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Ooh! That was amazing! How'd you do that?

title: Execute Command
text: Ah! I don't want to go.

title: Idle
text: Want to play Statues again? ...Ugh! How are you so good at this!

title: Summon
text: Nobody truly controls their destiny, yet you wield great power now. If you are prepared to accept the consequences... prove your worthiness to me.

title: Level Up
text: The accumulation of power is a necessary part of success.

title: Learn Skills
text: These abilities will soon come in handy.

title: Star Level Up
text: I appreciate your sincerity. Now, let us speak of the true reason you chose to cooperate with me.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Hmph, how did you believe I would respond?

title: Mail Reminder
text: A qualified commander would not miss any valuable communications.

title: Event Reminder
text: We should not let pass any opportunity that could alter the situation.

title: Chat
text: This is a world beyond my understanding. But I'm curious... how might you use such a power?

title: Chat 2
text: Perhaps you're shouldering some missions that belong only to you, and perhaps that leaves you feeling lost. But please remember - the reason we're here isn't just the various choices you've made, but also the decisions each of us made for ourselves... So do what you want to do.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: I hope you know exactly what you are doing.

title: Idle
text: Are you going to just waste time aimlessly?

title: Summon
text: A person's value does not depend on his identity, and his talents and courage will not be limited by the times. There will always be people on the stage of history and promote the changes of the times. Then these people... why can't they be you and me?

title: Star Level Up
text: Thank you, my comrade-in-arms, comrade, my only friend...

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Oh? Do you need my help?

title: Mail Reminder
text: What kind of news will the new mail bring?

title: Event Reminder
text: Every challenge is a new opportunity. Don't miss it.

title: Chat
text: In fact, I have long expected such an outcome, whether it is the failure of the plan ... or being betrayed and abandoned , just... , but I shouldn't indulge in fantasy.

title: Chat 2
text: In the past, you and I used to be comrades who walked side by side and shared life and death. No matter what the final result is, this friendship is real... I think I will live forever... no, I can never forget it.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Mm-hmm , you can start at any time.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: My friend, your way of expressing friendship is really special!

title: Idle
text: What's the matter? Would you like a drink?

title: Summon
text: It is The Hanged Men's mission to guard Iria by hook or by crook, regardless of life and honor ... and it was my oath . I'm Safiyyah Fatina. If you want to change the world, please allow me to walk side by side with you.

title: Level Up
text: This reminds me of the days when I was in military school with Rawiyah.

title: Star Level Up
text: What kind of return... would you expect...?

title: Serve as Assistant
text: I'm a professional at this job.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Do you want me to fetch the letter for you and read it to you in your ear . Hurry up and get the letter.

title: Event Reminder
text: Crisis and opportunity are both exterior and interior. This may be another opportunity to accumulate strength. Do you want to have a look together?

title: Chat
text: What's on my mind? Yes, I have done so many things for Iria over the years, but now I am in this Elysium, and I don't know if our choice is correct, and what will happen to Iria's future ... Can this not make people melancholy? OK, mine is over. Now, what about yours?

title: Chat 2
text: You know, people who want to resist fate and change the world have a special look on their faces, Dantalion is like this... so are you.

title: Chat 3
text: I've always believed that those who have left us, whether separated by life or death, continue to accompany us in some way, guiding our every move and breath... As long as they once entered the deepest part of your heart.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Are you... Are you sure you're ready?

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: It turns out that your heart is not always as calm as your appearance.

title: Execute Command
text: Don't worry about waiting for me to come back.

title: Greeting
text: Hmm? Is there anything I can do for you?

title: Idle
text: What are you thinking? An absent-minded look.

title: Summon
text: It's you… Relax, I'm just a mercenary, taking money without being picky about customers. In this hellhole, I'd imagine you need more strength too. You can afford my work. What's more simple than that?

title: Level Up
text: Yes, this investment will pay off.

title: Learn Skills
text: It's fair and square, and a useful trick is a good trick, right?

title: Star Level Up
text: All right, averting disasters in exchange for money. That's what we call a deposit.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Huh? All right, you're in charge.

title: Event Reminder
text: Better to do more than less. If you want to go, go by yourself.

title: Chat
text: Don't worry about food or drink. Eating what I can while waiting for death is the dream. After struggling like a dog for so many years, I never expected an easy life. Well, don't worry. I'll still finish the job.

title: Chat 2
text: That kid is quite popular on Elysium, much better than me. Col has been imitating how others talk lately. Can't let her pick up bad habits from her old man - ahem, I mean, from me...

title: Chat 3
text: You're absolutely right; the little one's ideas are what truly matter. Col seems fond of you when she says you're a nice leader. Col even mentioned treating you to a feast... Oh, how I struggle to cook anything fancy, but it seems I'm in for some trouble.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: You're too good a person… it's hopeless.

title: Idle
text: It's a happy life to lie on the ground and bask in the sun with enough food and drink.

title: Summon
text: Regardless of strength and status, everyone has irreplaceable value. But first, we should learn to be masters of our own destiny. Nice to meet you again, Leader.

title: Learn Skills
text: This power will certainly help more people.

title: Star Level Up
text: It is hard to imagine that I was the daughter of a craftsman not long ago. Thank you, I will live up to your expectations.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: I'm glad to be by your side.

title: Mail Reminder
text: There's new mail… don't you want to read it first?

title: Event Reminder
text: It seems that something is happening. Do you want to go and have a look?

title: Chat
text: Everyone is doing their best to adapt to life here even when small issues crop up. Elysium is full of hope and effort! I like it here!

title: Chat 2
text: I like bright sunshine and sunflowers, and heavy dark clouds and mimosa. Whether it is cloudy or sunny, the sky has a different charm, and so do you. Ah, is it strange...

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: I've never felt this way before, thank you.

title: Idle
text: Although I don't believe in fate, it seems that everything began to change the day I met you.

title: Summon
text: It seems every time we meet, you always help and encourage me. Once again, you have given me a place to stay. I hope to give you strength this time. To resist fate and change the world…

title: Level Up
text: Thank you for your trust, I will... I will continue to work hard!

title: Learn Skills
text: This power... I must shoulder my responsibilities.

title: Star Level Up
text: You always give me trust and support unconditionally...

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Being around you is always so inexplicably reassuring.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Apologies, you seem to have received an important letter.

title: Event Reminder
text: You have some tasks to be dealt with on your own time. Please mind your schedule.

title: Chat
text: Homes swallowed by war and displaced citizens... I often see such scenes in my dreams. I truly hope the people of Iria are able to live quiet, peaceful lives…

title: Chat 2
text: Recently, I dreamed of rebuilding my home with everyone, working hard and happy. Thank you for your company along the way. By your side, there is an inexplicable sense of peace of mind. What kind of magic do you have?

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: It is incredible... That which fills the space between our hearts flutters with warmth.

title: Idle
text: If you're feeling tired, feel free to rest here.

title: Summon
text: Sheltering the world and healing pain... such is the mission of both the Light of Sanctuary and myself. The road ahead may be under the shade, but I firmly believe that Radiant will eventually dispel the darkness, and the endless night will usher in the dawn.

title: Level Up
text: May the Light be with you.

title: Learn Skills
text: This power... may allow me to save more of those who suffer.

title: Star Level Up
text: You have been guiding me forward, thank you. I hope that in the future, we can illuminate each other's way forward.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: It's a pleasure to go with you.

title: Mail Reminder
text: The letters... have been sorted out for you.

title: Event Reminder
text: If you decide to face the dangers within the Sea of Chaos… Please allow me to walk alongside you.

title: Chat
text: Thank you for guarding this place. It is a pure land without suffering and darkness. A perfect, ideal sanctuary. There are many who suffer and dream of such a place... but it remains beyond their reach.

title: Chat 2
text: You're always worrying about me, but what about you? Are you... happy? What have you experienced lately? I... want to know it all. Can you tell me one by one?

title: Chat 3
text: Dazzling meteors and the vast sea of stars... The night sky on Elysium is beautiful. The road ahead is long too. Perhaps... there are even more beautiful sights waiting for us.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: It is always you who carries forward our burdens…

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: It is this Light... that keeps me from being lost in the dark.

title: Idle
text: Please just relax and allow me to help ease your fatigue.

title: Continuous Finisher
text: Haha, I'm in good shape again!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Thanks to your leadership, we have achieved a flawless victory. It seems Gloria can rest easy for now.

title: Standard Victory
text: It's our responsibility to bring every soldier home safely.

title: Injured
text: See who will be in trouble this time!

title: Critical
text: That's the battle I long for!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Good job. That's the man I appreciate. I would love to take you back to Luccia.

title: Standard Victory
text: Victory is always accompanied by sacrifice. As a Luccian, I have long been used to it.

title: Buff Ally
text: Let us fight side by side!

title: Critical
text: The banner of justice will never fall!

title: Perfect Victory
text: A perfect victory. Glad to fight together with you, my leader.

title: Standard Victory
text: Maybe that's the price of upholding justice... Thank you for bringing us a victory.

title: Summon
text: With fairness as my ruler and justice as my weapon, I will eliminate all the darkness and injustice in the world! This is my oath as a Paladin. Gloria Pascale Roland will fight together with you!

title: Level Up
text: Thank you, my leader. I won't let you down.

title: Learn Skills
text: I will use my strength more carefully.

title: Star Level Up
text: Thanks. I hope I can go along with you all the time, my leader.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Understood. I'll take care of the routine tasks.

title: Mail Reminder
text: You have a new mail. Please take care of it as soon as possible.

title: Event Reminder
text: You have a reservation. Do you need me to accompany?

title: Chat 2
text: I was confused about the ideal and reality. It is your firm support that gave me the courage to move forward. Thank you.

title: Chat 3
text: I think I have found my mission, that is, to protect the happiness of the world forever, whether in Iria or in Elysium... Thank you, my leader.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Thanks. This bond will be my everlasting treasure.

title: Idle
text: Such leisurely time is nice, too.

title: Injured
text: See who will be in trouble this time!

title: Critical
text: That's the battle I long for!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Good job. That's the man I appreciate. I would love to take you back to Luccia.

title: Standard Victory
text: Victory is always accompanied by sacrifice. As a Luccian, I have long been used to it.

title: Summon
text: I've never expected I would see you again in this way, my young Leader... um , or Elysium "Leader"? Not everyone can control my strength. Show me what you got.

title: Learn Skills
text: Oh? So you prefer this style of fighting.

title: Star Level Up
text: Oh, it looks like I'll have to respond to this expectation of yours.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: What a new experience. Are you sure you won't regret it?

title: Mail Reminder
text: Hey, your Mails! What? Do you want me to bring you the Mailbox ?

title: Event Reminder
text: Feel it? A new strength is surging in the Sea of Chaos.

title: Chat
text: Little guy, you've managed the place well, which reminds me of an old friend.

title: Chat 2
text: This is a really nice place to rest, isn't it? There's nothing I love more than doing nothing like this.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Like sleep tight after a long absence... well done!

title: Idle
text: It can be dangerous to stare blankly everywhere.

title: Deploy
text: My axe longs to taste the blood of invaders!

title: Continuous Finisher
text: Not an inch of ground will be relinquished!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Winning's just part of the job for us soldiers. Time to gear up for the next fight.

title: Standard Victory
text: Behind every victory lie countless soldiers who sacrificed their lives; to them belongs the glory.

title: Summon
text: Fate has a way of arranging the unexpected. It seems even this old man has unfinished business. With this great axe in hand, I, Magnus, am at your service!

title: Level Up
text: With this strength, I shall not lose to the youth just yet.

title: Learn Skills
text: With the skill from a lifetime of battle, those who defy us shall be brought to despair.

title: Star Level Up
text: Summoned by your esteem, I shall let my trusty axe sing the crimson song of battle once again!

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Hahaha! Brings me back to when I served General Faris.

title: Mail Reminder
text: There are no small matters during a war. Please check your letters promptly.

title: Event Reminder
text: Important business comes to the door, go to exercise together?

title: Chat
text: Faris and I suffered all our lives in an attempt to change Iria's fate. We never... expected such an end. Perhaps the time to pass it to the youth has come…

title: Chat 2
text: Look at the ups and downs of the world, just like the ups and downs of the Sea of Chaos. Fortunately, there is this pure land that you guard with all your heart. Being here, veterans have nothing else to ask for.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: I propose a toast to celebrate a friendship that transcends generations!

title: Greeting
text: What brings you around to chat with an old timer like me?

title: Idle
text: I have always been very busy. It's not too bad to relax on occasion.

title: Perfect Victory
text: Did... did I do it? Yes! I'll keep doing my best!

title: Standard Victory
text: I-I can do better! Can you take me with you again next time?

title: Summon
text: Is that really you? I already chose my fate once before when I joined the Hanged Men. But, I'm willing to try again... if it's with you.

title: Level Up
text: Well... I'll work hard. I always do.

title: Learn Skills
text: I will practice more... if it will help you.

title: Star Level Up
text: I... I may not be strong enough, but I will keep your acknowledgment in mind.

title: Mail Reminder
text: There... seem to be new letters…

title: Event Reminder
text: Are you going to start a new adventure? I... I have no other plans...

title: Chat
text: My brother once told me that the first sign of falling for a place is developing a love for its cuisine. And lately, I have found myself wanting to eat a lot more…

title: Chat 2
text: Although my brother is my most important person, I am willing to tell him not everything... well ...

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: This sensation is growing stronger… What is it...?

title: Idle
text: Ah... I'm sorry, I'm just a little nervous...

title: Deploy
text: Waiting for your instructions at any time.

title: Perfect Victory
text: It's a great honor to be in battle under your command!

title: Standard Victory
text: As part of the Hanged Men, I have long been accustomed to the sacrifice of my companions.

title: Summon
text: To guard Iria against the darkness, regardless of risk to life or reputation. Such is the doctrine of the Hanged Men. I am Nergal. What is it you are fighting for?

title: Level Up
text: We must continuously hone our skills.

title: Learn Skills
text: Battle skills can only be mastered through true combat.

title: Star Level Up
text: If you don't trust me, I will be of no use on the battlefield.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: This is not what I am good at, but I will master it as soon as possible.

title: Mail Reminder
text: There is new mail, please check it promptly.

title: Event Reminder
text: A new challenge has arisen, please deal with it promptly.

title: Chat
text: This Elysium is so peaceful that everyone seems to have lost their sense of tension. It's dangerous to become this complacent.

title: Chat 2
text: Unconsciously, this place has become like a real home. During this time, you made me discover a lot of things that were ignored before, thank you.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Sorry, I'm not used to this…

title: Idle
text: We don't have much time to waste.

title: Healthy
text: Leave it to me with confidence!

title: Injured
text: It's just a minor injury, it doesn't matter!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Another complete victory ... You are really good!

title: Standard Victory
text: Let's rest first, and leave it to me to clean the battlefield.

title: Summon
text: Whether it is reconnaissance or independent combat, it is my field of expertise... Although I don't know how I came here , since you are my identified partner, in the future... you will be protected by me, the gray wolf!

title: Level Up
text: Thank you for helping me. I will try my best!

title: Learn Skills
text: Hey! I'm sure... the enemy will be terrified when they see this!

title: Star Level Up
text: I didn't expect... I can get such attention, woo...

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Leave these to me, I am very experienced!

title: Mail Reminder
text: The new letters have been sorted out. If you need a reply, I can act as a messenger!

title: Event Reminder
text: *Sniff* I feel a new adventure, don't doubt, my sense of smell has always been very keen!

title: Chat
text: If you can help me, just let me know. I'm happy to help!

title: Chat 2
text: It's good here, so are you. I like you and everyone here. No matter where you want to go in the future, I will be by your side to protect you! Don't worry! Hey hey.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Come on! Uh... Still a little nervous.

title: Execute Command
text: Ensure that the task is completed!

title: Idle
text: Rest assured. I'll be on the lookout!

title: Deploy
text: You want to rely on my strength now?

title: Perfect Victory
text: The world is governed only by interests and absolute strength.

title: Standard Victory
text: You're satisfied with this victory, aren't you? Don't let me down.

title: Summon
text: Oh, I didn't expect it to be you. However, it doesn't make much difference where or for whom. If you need a soulless sword, I happen to be very good at...

title: Level Up
text: Power is the only real thing.

title: Star Level Up
text: I hope you won't regret it.

title: Mail Reminder
text: It's time to check the mail, "Leader."

title: Chat
text: Oh, is there anything we can talk about? I'm not going to satisfy your curiosity.

title: Chat 2
text: It's not a good habit to pry into other people's past. Put away your cheap sympathy. I don't need or deserve forgiveness.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Peeping into other people's hearts is a dangerous thing.

title: Idle
text: ... It is full of false friendliness, which is unpleasant.

title: Exhausted
text: Sorry, it was my dereliction of duty…

title: Perfect Victory
text: The direction of the war is not my concern. It is enough for me to fulfill my oath of protection.

title: Standard Victory
text: From beginning to end, you remained persistent. That is no simple task.

title: Summon
text: This place is… Ah, now I understand. I am Leonide, a Radiant Guard. My life and allegiance are not mine to claim; they have long been pledged elsewhere. I ask for your understanding. As for this lance I wield, it stands ready to serve you, should you desire its aid.

title: Star Level Up
text: Thank you very much, but I hope you understand that my loyalty belongs to another.

title: Mail Reminder
text: You have a new message to read.

title: Event Reminder
text: You have new business to be dealt with.

title: Chat
text: It is tranquil here. It's enough to quietly guard Elysium and those distant memories beyond recollection... This is enough.

title: Chat 2
text: "Love the world, and give people hope."... Please don't mind me; seeing the buds blooming under the new moon just brought back many memories... Thank you. I will get even closer to them and care for them until the day the garden is in full bloom.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: This ritual is consuming your energy. Is it really… worth it?

title: Deploy
text: A soldier's duty is to protect their country and its people!

title: Critical
text: Iria's soldiers... will never give in!

title: Perfect Victory
text: It's great having you in command. It was a smooth victory, hahaha!

title: Standard Victory
text: It was a difficult victory. Fortunately, you were here.

title: Alert
text: Don't say I didn't warn you!

title: Summon
text: A soldier must have the courage to stand tall, the blood to fight valiantly, and the spirit to face sacrifice. Ha, are you my new comrade-in-arms? Then, like me, we both battle to bring peace!

title: Level Up
text: Soldiers must maintain the attitude and will to refine the self.

title: Learn Skills
text: To hone powerful combat skills, one must work a hundred times harder than the rest. I am prepared to do so.

title: Star Level Up
text: Haha! I didn't expect to get such recognition from you. But, I refuse to be satisfied!

title: Serve as Assistant
text: No problem! Although I have never done this kind of task, haha!

title: Mail Reminder
text: Reporting in! New paperwork has been delivered to your desk. Please check it at your convenience!

title: Event Reminder
text: Reporting in! We received a challenge from the Sea of Chaos. Please leave it to me!

title: Chat
text: This place... doesn't seem to need people like me. However, this is good. A peaceful and happy home is what every soldier yearns for.

title: Chat 2
text: You are a trustworthy comrade-in-arms and a reliable leader. If there is anything I need in the future, just ask, I will always keep the consciousness of soldiers and prepare for battle!

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: This rushing feeling of blood through my chest... I am once again filled with determination!

title: Greeting
text: Ready for instructions at any time!

title: Idle
text: Even if you have nothing to do, you shouldn't be idle. Come join our warm-up training. We are doing a hundred laps around Elysium!

title: Deploy
text: The mission is about to begin.

title: Perfect Victory
text: Col, is a little tired... can I go home now?

title: Standard Victory
text: You... don't seem happy, I'm sorry, Col only know how to kill...

title: Summon
text: Miguel said that masks are used to protect oneself. Those who don't wear a mask actually wear many masks. Col doesn't understand. Col has only one mask, from Miguel. He said he hopes that one day… Col will not need… to wear a mask…

title: Star Level Up
text: You are a good person! Col likes you!

title: Mail Reminder
text: Hmm... this piece of paper, is it a letter?

title: Event Reminder
text: Target, do you want Col to handle it for you? Col is very good!

title: Chat
text: It's nice here, there are no bad people, Col likes it here, and the cats are cute , just don't let me touch...

title: Chat 2
text: My belly is full, and I feel great! Miguel really likes this place too... *burp* - Hehe... Miguel, I prepared a feast! Come eat with us, nice guy!

title: Chat 3
text: Col prepared a lot of canned food. When kittens eat it, they purr and roll over, letting Col pet their bellies... Want a can too, nice guy?

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Hmm... This, very good! Col likes it!

title: Idle
text: Um… Ooh! Are you playing Statues? Col is very good at it and has never lost! Hmm…

title: Deploy
text: Well, I guess if you need me so bad.

title: Special Finisher
text: I'm not here to make trouble.

title: Healthy
text: Who wants to be sawed in half?

title: Perfect Victory
text: Ah... a perfect victory. Samantha will certainly see me in a new light, don't you think? Oh, I suppose you did well, too.

title: Standard Victory
text: Haa... Next time you ask for my help, make sure it's actually a challenge, all right?

title: Summon
text: Fellow travelers are destined to cross paths, but it is the strong and resolute who shine as beacons for others. I am Garcia Miriam. I come in search of a figure that radiates dazzling Light. Is that you?

title: Star Level Up
text: Hmm... do you want to be friends with me?

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Alright, I'll help you out with this little thing.

title: Mail Reminder
text: I've collected the letters for you. Don't you even bother to read them?

title: Event Reminder
text: A new challenge, huh? Looks like you'd be in over your head without me. Let's go already—why the daze?

title: Chat
text: Hey! Can you not just casually chat me up? Do we look that chummy to you? Or are you itching... to find out what it's like to be split in two?

title: Chat 2
text: Peaceful Elysium? Hmph, boring enough to make me puke! Everyone has this serene look as they have ascended to heaven. Sorry, but faces like that are better off in a coffin. Hey, come saw some calamities with me!

title: Chat 3
text: The Chainsaw Wheel is spinning really smoothly today. Hmph, hmm hmm ♪. Hm? What do you need? -- My mood? Ahem, why care so much? Elysium doesn't tolerate slackers!

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: I'm warning you! Whatever you saw... if you... Ugh!

title: Execute Command
text: Sure enough, you just can't do it without me.

title: Idle
text: Hey! Do you make it a habit to stand in front of me without saying a word? Hmph!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Was there... a battle? I will not dwell on what I've done, I do what I must to make it up to you.

title: Standard Victory
text: You promised... once this experiment finished, you would... give Sascha back! ...Argh, my head... I'm... losing control…

title: Summon
text: Extreme pain and endless experimentation warped my mind and made me thirst for battle. For the love of my daughter, I embraced this inhuman form. It is for her that I stand unwavering. It is for her that I fight. In battle, there lies hope!

title: Level Up
text: My power is constant! No matter if my mind is with me or not.

title: Learn Skills
text: This time... will I manage to save my daughter...?

title: Star Level Up
text: More memories. More reminders of my incompetence as a father... More reminders of how far I've fallen... Yet, with every regained memory, my resolve strengthens. I will fight with all my might, in gratitude for your kindness.

title: Mail Reminder
text: A letter... Sascha... will this be from you?

title: Event Reminder
text: What is this? It's calling me…

title: Chat
text: What... just happened? Did I lose myself again? Did I hurt anyone? I have to go save my daughter…

title: Chat 2
text: Perhaps madness is also a kind of kindness of fate. Whenever you are awake, you have to face... its cruelty.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: You shoulder a heavy burden for one teetering on the edge of madness, a creature forged for slaughter. I am in your debt…

title: Idle
text: I'm sorry... I... I'm sorry I didn't take good care of you... Sascha…

title: Special Finisher
text: With such identity, I naturally have a card up my sleeve.

title: Summon
text: To find out the truth, one must take action bravely. This is what a ballad once inspired me to do. I believe there is an answer out there that can shed light, and I will do what I can... to find it for the future of Vlder.

title: Level Up
text: Thank you, every strength means a lot to me.

title: Learn Skills
text: It reminds me of the fighting skills my sister taught me when I was a kid.

title: Star Level Up
text: I think I'll remember this day.

title: Mail Reminder
text: You received mail from a considerate sender.

title: Event Reminder
text: The Sea of Chaos has changed recently. Don't you want to see it?

title: Chat
text: Everything in Elysium makes one calm... But whenever I look at the Sea of Chaos, I'm reminded of my home and that night of parting when the sky was full of stars and the breeze was gentle.

title: Chat 2
text: Vlder's ballads are not written for praise, but to remember every emotion worth cherishing. And what about you... can you feel the emotion in the melody?

title: Chat 3
text: No matter how I adjust the melody can't perfectly express the emotion in my heart , and I've never experienced anything like this before . Um, you are right. After all...there will be ample time ahead for us.

title: Summon
text: I've never expected I would see you again in this way, young Leader... um , or Elysium "Leader"? Not everyone can control my strength. Show me what you got.

title: Learn Skills
text: Oh? So you prefer this style of fighting.

title: Star Level Up
text: Oh, it looks like I'll have to respond to this expectation of yours.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: What a new experience. Are you sure you won't regret it?

title: Mail Reminder
text: Hey, your Mails! What? Do you want me to bring you the Mailbox ?

title: Event Reminder
text: Feel it? A new strength is surging in the Sea of Chaos.

title: Chat
text: Little guy, you've managed the place well, which reminds me of an old friend.

title: Chat 2
text: This is a really nice place to rest, isn't it? There's nothing I love more than doing nothing like this.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Like sleep tight after a long absence... well done!

title: Idle
text: It can be dangerous to stare blankly everywhere.

title: Summon
text: The winds of the Vltar Mountain have guided our meeting. I am LilyWill. The bow and arrow I wield are used solely for protecting the homeland of my people and our cherished family members.

title: Level Up
text: Every bit of strength is precious to us.

title: Learn Skills
text: This power may enable me to save more of my family.

title: Star Level Up
text: I will always remember your support and dedication.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Don't worry, leave everything to me.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Are there any new letters that need to be dealt with immediately?

title: Event Reminder
text: Call for me when you are ready to set off. I believe… you may need my assistance.

title: Chat
text: Every choice; every battle. All concern our destiny. Vlderians cherish every promise, and betrayal… will not be forgiven.

title: Chat 2
text: There are those who say you're avoiding me… but you are not that kind of person, right? I dislike the rumors. Take me along for the next battle so that we can put their words to rest.

title: Chat 3
text: Mmm… I slept really well! I can sense your presence all around here. Seems someone has been taking good care of their territory! Thank you… even without the winds of Vltar Mountain, I feel at ease.

title: Greeting
text: Well, what can I do for you?

title: Idle
text: You know what? Nono also likes to be in a daze, and often overlooks on Vltar Mountain with the mountain wind blowing.

title: Summon
text: Seeing the zeal of youth in pursuit of their dreams always fills me with a mix of envy and admiration. I am Knight Teadon Alfred, at your service to offer whatever support I can.

title: Learn Skills
text: I hope my power can be useful to you.

title: Star Level Up
text: I will do my best to honor your expectations.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Hehe, this is a familiar job.

title: Mail Reminder
text: My leader, there is correspondence awaiting your attention.

title: Event Reminder
text: Your Excellency seems to have unfinished business.

title: Chat
text: The courage to resist fate and the wisdom to see the world, you are truly incredible.

title: Chat 2
text: You seem a little tired. I'm just trying to develop some new desserts. How about it? Do you have time to try it together? Moderate intake of sugar can relax and relieve fatigue.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Sorry to trouble you once again.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: I'm really sorry to bother you every time.

title: Greeting
text: What can I do for you?

title: Idle
text: Moderate relaxation is also necessary to make progress.

title: Serve as Assistant 1
text: You want me to be your assistant? How dare you!

title: Mail Reminder 1
text: The Mailbox is getting full, human.

title: Event Reminder 1
text: Is it time for the Fool to embark on a new journey? Don't forget to bring me souvenirs!

title: Event Reminder 2
text: A new beacon has appeared in the Sea of Chaos. Bring back all the treasures for me!

title: Chat 3
text: It seems as though you are getting used to life in Elysium. Hmph, don't be smug. You have plenty to learn, yet.

title: Chat 4
text: The greatest thing in the Sea of Chaos is Canned Octopus. What, you have no interest? You have terrible taste in food, it seems I have more to instruct you on...

title: Chat 5
text: Have you... been a little lazy recently? Well, even I want to simply watch the fish sometimes... Hmm, you can rest in Elysium, but be sure to make up for the time off later!

title: Chat 6
text: Maitha is a good assistant. She cleans Elysium every day, and even found the ball of yarn I lost a while back. Make sure to help her in your spare time!

title: Chat 7
text: Many more people are arriving in Elysium recently. It's not bad, but there are more people plotting against me. You need to better protect me! If Beryl plucks my hairs for her experiments one more time, then I'm going to pull out all of yours, too!

title: Chat 8
text: I've never considered that everyone in Elysium has their own history... Yet, somehow you are able to have them fight together regardless. Is this because of your so-called "bond"? Hmph, it doesn't bother me... But when you're not in Elysium, you need watch out for some of them!

title: Chat 1
text: Let me guess... You ran out of Endurance again, right? Do not give me that look, I cannot give you more!

title: Chat 2
text: Are you exploring the Spiral of Destinies again today? So selfish, even though you go so often, you never bring me back food…

title: Idle 1
text: Is now truly the time to laze around? Get to work!

title: Idle 2
text: Gonna sleep more... huh? It's already this late?!

title: Vending 1
text: The Vending machine is open! Let's see what the recommended items are.

title: Vending 2
text: It's no easy feat to obtain these treasures from the Sea of Chaos. They're priceless!

title: Check-in 1
text: You're here! Eh-hem… It seems you're here.

title: Check-in 2
text: I'm keeping record of your daily performance.

title: Serve as Assistant 2
text: Towards the Sea of Chaos, onward!

title: Mail Reminder 2
text: Check the Mailbox! Perhaps there's something tasty...

title: Critical
text: Stay cool, we need a game-changer.

title: Perfect Victory
text: A clean sweep! That's the mark of true elites.

title: Standard Victory
text: Your command skills could use some leveling up, Leader.

title: Summon
text: In this world of flux, you're either the change-maker or the forgotten… It's all about the choices you make. I'm Knight Simona, battling to reshape and right the world's wrongs. To my future ally… don't let me down.

title: Level Up
text: I won't settle for such minor progress.

title: Learn Skills
text: The cold wind brought nothing but… ice and destruction.

title: Star Level Up
text: I'll show that I'm worthy of this trust.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Greatness embraces every detail, no matter how small.

title: Mail Reminder
text: I've sorted out the new letters.

title: Event Reminder
text: Trouble's brewing. If you're tied up, I'll take charge… and command this operation.

title: Chat
text: The Sea of Chaos, Elysium, the dimension fragment… How does this world tick anyway…

title: Chat 2
text: Seems we both yearn for change. Despite the unknown challenges ahead, I'm looking forward to fighting alongside you to reshape this world.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: "Spiritual Forging," you say? I'm ready whenever you are.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: I hope this "Bond" won't shackle us on our journey ahead.

title: Idle
text: Leader, now is not the time for twiddling our thumbs.

title: Deploy
text: Hope I can be of help at least.

title: Standard Finisher
text: All thanks to your wise command.

title: Continuous Finisher
text: Looks like I wasn't holding the team back.

title: Heavy Damage
text: Hang in there a little longer…

title: Critical
text: This battle will echo through history.

title: Exhausted
text: I have no regrets about my choices…

title: Perfect Victory
text: This victory will echo through history… Your power, my friend, could reshape the world.

title: Standard Victory
text: May these sacrifices be etched in history, warning future generations of the brutality of war and the fragility of peace…

title: Summon
text: Some brave mountains and rivers in search of truth, while others languish in life's cages… Perhaps that's destiny's decree. You know, friend, your arrival has kindled a new hope within me.

title: Level Up
text: Books hold knowledge and echo the vistas of journeys through mountains and rivers.

title: Learn Skills
text: May this strength fuel your ideals one day.

title: Star Level Up
text: I'll etch this unforgettable day in ink.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Letters aren't just vital for sharing news, they're a heartfelt exchange of emotions.

title: Event Reminder
text: Pushing past fear to explore the unknown might be humanity's pivotal drive.

title: Chat
text: I find solace at the docks, mesmerized by the expanse of the Sea of Chaos. While Iria's history may pale in comparison to this boundless space, its beauty and long past are forever irreplaceable to me.

title: Chat 2
text: Once, we shed our identities, binding sincere emotions through stories… Thank you for choosing as you did, may history eternally remember our friendship!

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: The link between souls… was once just a distant hope for me.

title: Greeting
text: My friend, have you come for some stories?

title: Idle
text: I'm suddenly missing that night, sheltering in a cave from the rain…

title: Deploy
text: I'm itching for an exhilarating battle!

title: Healthy
text: Let me see what you've got!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Haha, a hard-earned victory, thanks to your command! And, of course, my courage!

title: Standard Victory
text: Don't fret! Master taught me that instead of dwelling on past losses, aim for an even more perfect win next time!

title: Summon
text: You're the leader, huh? Seems we're close in age… I'm Alexei, Luccia's Brutebear Warrior, and deputy leader of the Silver Wolf Mercenary Group! What do you say? Up for a spar?

title: Level Up
text: My dual axes strike fear into enemies!

title: Learn Skills
text: That's the power I need, you do get me!

title: Star Level Up
text: You call the shots. I'll bring the fight. We'll make a perfect duo! Leader, you can count on me to cover your back!

title: Serve as Assistant
text: No sweat, I always help my master with mercenary group affairs.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Leader, need me to move the mailbox next to your desk?

title: Event Reminder
text: Looks like we've got new trouble… No worries, I can handle five Calamities single-handedly!

title: Chat
text: H-hold up! Doesn't this feel a bit off… If we want to get to know each other, let's do it through training! That's how we Luccia warriors do!

title: Chat 2
text: Sure enough, only through sparring do I realize, I'm still leagues away from being a reliable leader… Well, warriors hone their skills through countless battles! Once I vanquish 2,000 Calamities, you'll see a whole new me!

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Is this some kind of totem ritual? Haha, let's dive in!

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Thanks to you, I'm feeling stronger than ever!

title: Execute Command
text: You have my word, mission completion guaranteed!

title: Idle
text: Warriors, courage is the key! Yeah, that's the spirit.

title: Deploy
text: Let's put an end to this chaos and bring back peace.

title: Special Finisher
text: Plan first, then act. Well done.

title: Continuous Finisher
text: In chaos, we need someone to steer us right!

title: Buff Ally
text: Fear not, for I am here.

title: Perfect Victory
text: Through thick and thin, you've clung to your convictions in battle without faltering, and I know how tough that can be.

title: Standard Victory
text: The more one seeks to protect, the more fragile they become. But I have faith you won't be brought down by it.

title: Summon
text: In the lingering night, some chase the dawn while others watch it slip away… Forgive me, for I cannot give you the answers to the path of radiance, but… meeting you now might just be my chance to set sail anew.

title: Learn Skills
text: Hope all of this helps in the end.

title: Star Level Up
text: Your trust in me means everything, so this time, I won't falter.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: It's been ages since I've tackled these tasks… Feeling a bit rusty, to be honest.

title: Mail Reminder
text: These letters must be important, right? I've organized them for you.

title: Event Reminder
text: With new changes afoot, this could be the game-changer we need.

title: Chat
text: Here, no power struggles, no tangled webs of deceit. The old glory fades away… It's time to release it all…

title: Chat 2
text: "To love all, to inspire hope," was my vow to the radiant. Now, I can finally unburden myself and confront my inner self… Everything is serene and clear… Thank you…

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: If you're feeling anxious, just close your eyes for a moment.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: This clear, warm sensation… feels so familiar, bringing a long-lost calm to my heart.

title: Idle
text: Busy work can wear you out, so remember to relax when necessary. Don't push yourself too hard.

title: Deploy
text: Battle performances… are part of a dancer's role.

title: Standard Finisher
text: Need me to go easy on you?

title: Received Buff
text: I'll make it up to you.

title: Healthy
text: What do you expect me to do?

title: Perfect Victory
text: Who says battle and dance have nothing in common?

title: Standard Victory
text: Vlderians dance for the fallen in battle, inheriting their will and… their rage.

title: Summon
text: Beauty often invites danger, a proverb well-known to Vlderians. So… why not turn such beauty into a lethal weapon? And if you happen to need such a weapon, well, you're in luck.

title: Level Up
text: Accumulating experience… an essential grind for any dancer.

title: Learn Skills
text: Mastering skill over brute force… a lesson for dancers, as well as assassins.

title: Star Level Up
text: You're doing it willingly, right? I didn't bewitch you… did I?

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Now, I'll have all your time to myself.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Your mail's here… Looks like you've got quite a few people fretting over you.

title: Event Reminder
text: New crisis, huh? Need… my help getting out of trouble?

title: Chat
text: Dance is how Vlderians express themselves, whether in joy or sorrow, we find a way to let it out… So, what about you? How do you let it all out?

title: Chat 2
text: Everyone's got secrets they'd rather keep under wraps. Dancer or warrior? Hmph… Does it really matter? As long as we share the same goals and face the same enemies, that's all that counts.

title: Chat 3
text: I thought… the dance of blades would save me, but it led me into another abyss. It wasn't until I met you that I found the true meaning of my dance. Hmph… You're more important to me than I realized.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Quite an intriguing experience, feels like I've gotten to know you better.

title: Idle
text: You know, you're actually leaving yourself wide open.

title: Deploy
text: Don't worry, I've been in plenty of situations like this!

title: Continuous Finisher
text: No one can stand up to my iron pan!

title: Self Buff
text: Can't work on an empty stomach!

title: Critical
text: We fight until the end, never giving up!

title: Exhausted
text: Sorry, I can't be with you anymore…

title: Perfect Victory
text: Awesome! I told you, my pan is invincible!

title: Standard Victory
text: Ups and downs are part of life! Don't lose heart, next time will be even better!

title: Summon
text: Wow, this place looks amazing, definitely worth a deep dive! Hey, you know your way around here, right? How about you be my guide? Let's start a new adventure together!

title: Level Up
text: Incredible! Full of power like eating a sunny side up egg!

title: Learn Skills
text: What's this? Is it even more powerful than my pan?

title: Star Level Up
text: I declare! We're officially diary-sharing pals!

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Chopping wood, making fire, cooking meals—I'm your guy! Huh? Not that?

title: Mail Reminder
text: Leader! New mail alert! Let's not keep the sender waiting, they might get upset!

title: Event Reminder
text: New adventure game? Let's dive in together! Quick, quick!

title: Chat
text: Leader, storytime! Wait, why do I love storytelling so much? Um… because… Turning anything into a story makes it interesting, good or bad!

title: Chat 2
text: Is truth really that important? Maybe ignorance is bliss… Hehe, just a thought! I mean, would Faycal still be as thrilled about my experimental dish if he knew I used an octopus can?

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Hm… I'm all set! Let's get this party started!

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Wow! What a magical experience. Traveling with you is truly exciting!

title: Greeting
text: Any fun or funny stories today? Awkward moments count too!

title: Idle
text: Life's a whirlwind, this downtime's hard-earned! Just chilling quietly with you is nice.

title: Deploy
text: Battles shift like markets, may you stay on your toes.

title: Continuous Finisher
text: Let's finish this quick and clean!

title: Healthy
text: Bide your time before you strike.

title: Critical
text: Every cloud has a silver lining.

title: Exhausted
text: No… I still have a duty to fulfill…

title: Perfect Victory
text: The strong get stronger, winner takes all—it's a solid start. You've sparked anticipation for our next collaboration.

title: Standard Victory
text: Profit often walks hand in hand with risk, you should know that.

title: Summon
text: Excellent, this is our contract for future collaboration. Rest assured, it's totally fair and square, mutually beneficial—way more reliable than any sentimental ties or bonds. Come, a simple seal is all it takes, and the deal is sealed.

title: Level Up
text: This investment won't let you down.

title: Star Level Up
text: Bold investment! What's your expected return rate? Double? Triple? Tenfold? Heh, trust me, whatever you're expecting, the returns I bring will surpass your wildest dreams.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Smart choice. Consider these tasks as my "service charges" for now.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Stay in the loop, keep the business booming, and make sure to check updates promptly.

title: Event Reminder
text: New challenges bring fresh opportunities. Why not give it a shot?

title: Chat
text: Is there truly a corner of the world untouched by the pursuit of gain? Then what binds human connections? Trust, they say? Heh… Just another tool.

title: Chat 2
text: I've dreamt of shaping a new world in countless ways but never expected to find friends here… Friends untouched by shared interests…

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: Alright… if it maximizes our gains, then so be it.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Is this what they call a "bond"? It seems… not that bad…

title: Greeting
text: What's up? I've got more quests on my plate.

title: Idle
text: Time's ticking, and golden chances don't linger.

title: Deploy
text: How do you expect me to play along?

title: Injured
text: Go on, I can take it.

title: Critical
text: I hear the serpent's hiss… it's getting closer…

title: Exhausted
text: I fought through fire and water to be here…

title: Perfect Victory
text: That refreshing flavor… please, keep it coming.

title: Standard Victory
text: You've been sweating it out. Hit the baths later to cool down.

title: Summon
text: I came at Lukamar's behest. Whether in Elysium or Hashalaram's palace, as long as our paths align, I'll serve you with imperial standards.

title: Level Up
text: Power like this is a weapon for decisive moments.

title: Learn Skills
text: Intriguing skills… I'll hone them diligently.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: If it's you, I'm happy to oblige.

title: Mail Reminder
text: Snacks and tea await, along with the new letters on your desk. Please take a moment to peruse.

title: Event Reminder
text: Things are heating up outside, maybe… you wouldn't want to miss it?

title: Chat
text: Laying low is part of my job—you've just uncovered that. Congrats. Now, can you help me keep it under wraps?

title: Chat 2
text: I can't see myself through others' eyes, oddly making me feel more at ease, more bold… You know, since I can't see you either, feel free to let go in front of me.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: Your face seems to come into focus for me…

title: Greeting
text: Welcome back. How about a relaxing bath?

title: Idle
text: I'll be ready when you need me.

title: Standard Finisher
text: Keep practicing and come back stronger!

title: Injured
text: Show them what we're made of!

title: Perfect Victory
text: Piece of cake! Hey, why don't we make big money off this?

title: Standard Victory
text: Well done, everyone, come grab some cookies!

title: Summon
text: Heh, here I come! These parrots are my trusty pals, can they join us? I'll bring the cookies. They'll do the tricks! Trust that you've got our backs, boss?

title: Learn Skills
text: Got it! We'll put on a show for you!

title: Star Level Up
text: Such wondrous power—I feel like I could fly too!

title: Serve as Assistant
text: We'll take turns on watch, you're okay with that, right?

title: Mail Reminder
text: The parrots brought new mail!—Right on your desk, boss. Don't forget to save us a few cookies!

title: Event Reminder
text: What's that? The parrots just chirped in about a fresh opportunity! Chop-chop, let's roll out!

title: Chat
text: I adore the freedom here, but I still prefer Hashalaram's streets, even as ever-changing as they may be. I'd love to take you on a walk from end to end. And the kids there would surely like you too!

title: Chat 2
text: Sorry about that, we just had another spat. It's a regular thing with us. That's how friends are, right? Discovering each other's flaws but still inseparable in the end. I hope we can be like that too…

title: Greeting
text: Shahin's kinda missing you, right, Shahin?

title: Idle
text: Shh! Goli, Baloor, let's sneak a peek quietly.

title: Level Up
text: Just like steel, it is forged through gradual refinement, step by step.

title: Chat 2
text: You're absolutely right; the little one's ideas are what truly matter. Col seems fond of you when she says you're a nice leader. Col even mentioned treating you to a feast... Oh, how I struggle to cook anything fancy, but it seems I'm in for some trouble.

title: Chat 2
text: Rather than wasting time here, don't you have more important things to do, "Lord Leader"? After all, nothing is more important than changing the world, right?

title: Special Finisher
text: Choosing the right moment to act. That's not bad.

title: Healthy
text: Advance, retreat, attack, defend, how will you choose?

title: Critical
text: I'm sure you know what you're doing.

title: Perfect Victory
text: The contest on the battlefield begins before the fighting even starts. Achieving victory before battle, you did quite well indeed.

title: Standard Victory
text: The more thorough the preparation and the more accurate the judgment, the smaller the price. But for now, let's enjoy our victory.

title: Summon
text: The weather's not bad. I came here because of you? Heh, don't mind it. Everyone is either a player or a piece, sometimes both. Tell me, what forces are you fighting against, and what kind of balance are you seeking?

title: Level Up
text: One step closer to the destination.

title: Learn Skills
text: The art of victory requires both wit and means.

title: Star Level Up
text: Stand taller and you'll see the bigger picture more clearly.

title: Serve as Assistant
text: Some details can indeed decide success or failure.

title: Mail Reminder
text: The best time to read a letter is the moment you receive it. If you believe information has value, you know it also depreciates.

title: Event Reminder
text: I like this kind of change, within plans yet beyond expectations. Go take a look.

title: Chat
text: Chess? You're a commander, you understand the game. A good opponent is harder to find than a good teammate.

title: Spiritual Forging Ready
text: A bond helps to accomplish things. I'm willing to try.

title: Spiritual Forging Complete
text: It's a... very deep bond, yet unexpectedly simple. This is good. Simple means sturdy.

title: Greeting
text: Here? Shall we continue our last chess game?

title: Idle
text: What are you waiting for? Or... are you trying to capture the changes around by keeping yourself still?
